org.fhnw.aigs.BinaerOperatoren.client

Class BinaerOperatorenPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.fhnw.aigs.swingClient.GUI.BackgroundPanel
              • org.fhnw.aigs.BinaerOperatoren.client.BinaerOperatorenPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BinaerOperatorenPanel
extends org.fhnw.aigs.swingClient.GUI.BackgroundPanel
    This is the graphical representation of the BinaerOperatorenSpiel. It contains labels for the score the status and the current question, an answer field and a send button.
    v1.0 Initial release
    v1.0.1 Minor changes
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli (v1.0)
    See Also:
